name: Lost Photon
description:
Escape a maze with your little friend, Photon.
You need to get through 4 levels.

How does this fit the theme? - Workflow.

I made the music partially with melodies AI has created. I also used some AI generated images and then put a shader on them to create my graphics.

Controls WASD / Arrows --- Movement Mouse --- Guide Photon Credits

+ Leamur [ Help with maze creation ]
+ muneset [ Avoiding creative blocks with music ]
+ artbreeder.com [ Backround Images ]
+ Whiteshampoo [ DESTROYED that game breaking bug for me :) ]
